attributes.action: Limit non business travel in England to 50 miles from home.
attributes.additional_details: To protect people from Covid-19 living in tourist hotspots.
attributes.background: We want to limit the movement of staycationers to reduce the R factor in tourist hotspots such as Somerset, Dorset, Devon, Cornwall, Cumbria and The Peak District

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324044
